text:
Navigate within the different tabs. Several sub-menus are available.
The Overview of the Sampling programmes will be automatically displayed.

Select the different input filters you are interested in visualizing.
In this example, you can move the toggle across several years or select a single one.
Plots will be updated automatically unless indicated otherwise
Scroll up and down the page! Some information might not be directly visible.
If you have any questions or suggestions, you can contact the Marine Institute Shellfish team here
If you would like to share this website, you can also do it here
